trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) or text is used to encode SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否消息传输优化机制 (MTOM) 或文本使用 SOAP 消息进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Used by interoperable bindings, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> to specify the SOAP message encoding that may be used.
trans-unit.target: 由可互操作绑定，如<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding>，和<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>来指定可能使用的 SOAP 消息编码。</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The Message-Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) is a method for efficiently encoding binary XML elements within the context of a SOAP envelope.
trans-unit.target: 消息传输优化机制 (MTOM) 是高效编码的 SOAP 信封的上下文中二进制 XML 元素的方法。

trans-unit.source: Text encodings for messages, such as UTF8, are used for interoperability purposes.
trans-unit.target: 文本编码的消息，如 UTF8，用于互操作性用途。

trans-unit.source: Note that the standard bindings designed for interoperability with Web services do not use binary encodings.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，专用于与 Web 服务互操作性进行标准绑定并使用二进制编码。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the standard bindings, see [System-Provided Bindings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关标准绑定的详细信息，请参阅[系统提供的绑定](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: MTOM is used to encode the SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 用于对 SOAP 消息进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Text is used to encode the SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 使用文本对 SOAP 消息进行编码。
